description: Boisterous and self-important, Kurosaki is Japan`s national PlaWrestling champion for three consecutive years. However, he loses from Sanshiro in the first episode, partly due to damage his PlaWrestler, Mad Hurricane, sustained during the championship match. This event makes Kurosaki a fierce rival of Sanshiro, and they clash for most of the series. Later on, Kurosaki becomes more sympathetic after seeing the troubles Sanshiro has to overcome and ends up his ally. Kurosaki is the region`s foremost Fighting-Type modeler, following the philosophy of winning at any cost.
name: Gendou Kurosaki
